short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for helpfully informing you that someone went to OxBridge

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OxBridge is the helpful browsing companion that, whilst you are browsing, will inform you when you stumble upon someone who is a known alumnus of the University of Oxford or the University of Cambridge. That's it! 

This extension runs entirely in your browser and makes no external web requests, meaning it does not collect any information about your browsing or the content of web pages.

All alumni identified are taken from:
- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_University_of_Cambridge_people
- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_University_of_Oxford_people

This project was inspired by a friend who would never miss an opportunity to point out when a celebrity they knew went to Oxford or Cambridge in casual conversation. This is for you.
